name: Dauntless Debate
description:
Important Note: Dauntless Debate is still in development. This is an open beta for playtesting purposes.

Dauntless Debate is a two-player virtual boardgame!

You and your opponent had a hefty argument about a certain topic. In order to solve this issue both of you gathered your debate clubs for a debate-off on the streets.

Guide your debaters and win over as many members of the opposing debate club as you can.
